title: Clown fiesta: tell your story
body:
I just had my first real clown fiesta. It was in blind  draft.

During draft, someone called mid, I called support. 

The other 3 players were silent.

Match starts.

All three players rush bot lane with me,without buying items, tower rush and die as they try to get a  kill.

At that point I just left as it was my last match I could play before going to work.....

replies.body: I had a yasuo in my ranked game
Are you sure those three players were human? What game mode was this?
